models

Class VisitCardDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.VisitCardDAO

  • public class VisitCardDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class connects the Visit Card module to the DB. i.e., contains all the CRUD operations for the visit card.

      • getUserVisitCards

        public static java.util.ArrayList<VisitCardDTO> getUserVisitCards(java.lang.String email,
                                                                  SVCDB db)
        gets the list of visit cards owned by the user.
        Parameters:
        email - The user email
        db - The DB instance
        Returns:
        A list of visit cards (empty if user owns none).

      • deleteVC

        public static boolean deleteVC(java.lang.String email,
                               java.lang.String first_name,
                               java.lang.String last_name,
                               SVCDB db)
        Deletes a visit card from the DB.
        Parameters:
        email - The email field of the visit card to delete
        first_name - The first_name field of the visit card to delete.
        last_name - The last_name field of the visit card to delete.
        db - The DB instance.
        Returns:
        success/failure of the operation
